stripped_text: When you rez this ice, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it. This ice gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter. Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.
text:
When you rez this ice, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it.
This ice gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter.
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.
